eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; AT 11:22 PM ON SEP 26, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:22 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: SAN CARLOS APACHE TRIBE: FLASH FLOOD warning in Farmers Station, Gopher Spring Dance Grounds, Beaver Springs Dance Grounds. Flood waters can move swiftly and rise rapidly. Driving into flooded areas is extremely dangerous and may result in injury or death. IF IN A LOW-LYING AREA, move to higher ground.
